name: Die();
description:
A game made for Kenney Jam 2020

My first Jam AND my first game whatsoever. I wanted to keep it simple and small just so i could actually finish something. 

Sorry about everything and thanks for anyone who played.

Stupid hard 2D-platformer, inspired by stupid-hard Super Mario Maker levels.

Try to survive the cursed cave and see if you can make it out alive. No checkpoints, no mercy. You're not gonna make it.

--------------------------------------------

Known issues: 

- Physics are a bit wonky sometimes, for example in the long drops

- The Propellerhat-dude sometimes just buggers off for some reason and can't be arsed to follow (and kill) you 

--------------------------------------------

Devlog (in Finnish) available in here: https://mikkokoodaa.wordpress.com/2020/08/23/firstgameever-die/
